column1: * 2009 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria (volume)
* 2010 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is announced for release in 2011.
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
*** Many Dwarves and Men flee into Lonely Mountain and are besieged.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee travel northward along the Morgai.

column2: mail shirt and sword to Barad-dûr
